subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Manfred Moelgg of Italy won the World Cup slalom title in the final race of the season.Moelgg led after the first run in Bormio, Italy, and finished in a tie for sixth place, good enough for the title after the prerace standings leader, Jean-Baptiste Grange of France, slipped in the second run and finished last.Reinfried Herbst of Austria won the race in 1 minute 51.31 seconds for his second victory of the season.
